description:
The best browser for the 21st Century.
The developers have the right idea. Choose FOSS wherever it is available, stable, and secure.
summary: The best browser for the 21st Century

description: This is the worst browser I have ever used. Sorry but I am going to uninstall it.
summary: This is the worst I have ever use

description: Good FOSS browser, It works well, All the other reviews that are bad are just people trapped in the proprietary mess that controls their thinking and they can't think for themselves or have an open mind.
Just the right amount of browser.
I am liberated once again by peers who have created this awesome browser.
It's a nice browser, having various defaults like non-free Javascript being turned off. It also runs Tor in private mode, a killer feature IMHO. Sadly it is sometimes a bit behind on updates.
summary: A very privacy-focused and secure web browser

description: You love freedom? You want Firefox without the nonfree stuff? This browser is for you! It's basically Firefox ESR with the non-free components removed and it works great. It has built in tracking and ad blockers as well.
summary: The best free as in freedom browser there is

description: An absolutely fantastic browser that removes all of the non-free stuff that is polluting the web these days.
Cares about your freedom and privacy. Recommended for everyone.
Block execution of non-free JavaScript (experimental) better way than noscript ;)

It's disgusting, don't wast your time to install it. I think all the reviewers who are interested to this might be spam. What the hell is this? It does not even load youtube and complain about non-free java script! google, etc. I don't know why this software is proved to be in Software. It should be omitted. Please consider it. The developer owe me the wasted time.
summary: It's completely waste of time. Too disgusting browser

description: Thank GNU for making the interwebs a bit safer for the rest of us. An excellent effort in my opinion, strongly recommended.

Love the scaled down version..like a "clean" android Oreo install without the bloatware.

I'm still researching this error when trying to reach sites. : The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because it uses an invalid or unsupported form of compression. 
I'll DuckDuckGo until I find the fix..Firefox runs fine as well as other connected apps. Cheers

I see many people in the other reviews complaining that this browser does not work with things like Gmail or Hangouts. Well, that is really the fault of Google and other companies. They send you nonfree JavaScript to run, and infringe on your freedom. I agree that LibreJS needs some work, but don't say this is horrible when it is defending you from the evils of some websites.
summary: Amazing browser that defends your freedom

description: Has many built in benefits for those who are invested in software freedom and privacy. It still has a few kinks here and there. But it's, overall, a great browser.
summary: Great for freedom and privacy lovers

description: A noble effort from the free software guys, but a pain in the butt to use. Spent my time turning add-ons off and on just to do basic things on websites. This browser is just not fit for the modern internet. Try Ephemeral for a simpler, more elegant – and workable – privacy solution.
Firefox is getting worse by release. Now in 2019 I still wait up to 20 seconds on startup, on 12gb ram and i7 new notebook. C'mon.
Coming from Google Chrome, this one sucks big time. Websites just don't work and it does not help to blame them for using java script etc... So ten minutes later, this browser gets removed again.
this browser is AMAZING! i tried it and it was a very good experience 10/10
This browser is based on Mozilla Firefox (ESR branch) and adds some useful extensions and add-ons, although most are available for regular Firefox as well.
You're supposed to disable any extension that hinders your browsing experience. If you do that it's just privacy-hardened Firefox without any telemetry.
summary: People don't know how to use this software

description: Appreciate the effort taken to develop such a product and making it FREE for all
This app is fast on android but on desktop it is very slow compared to chromium based browsers or firefox
This is a great browser it would just take a lot of time for me to migrate all of my configurations over from Firefox.

GNU IceCat is the ideal browser if you value your privacy, but would rather not let go of Mozilla Firefox altogether. LibreJS and a couple of other anti-nonfreeJS addons are turned on by default, but you can turn them off easily if they start breaking websites.
summary: A safe and private, mainstream browser

description:
Firefox ESR is much faster than icecat.
I dont know why.

Also, it should provide option for you to remove the addon.

This browser is focused on privacy meaning that all telemetry and tracking is removed, however many websites might not work due to heavy optimization and disabling javascript, but if you care about privacy and know what this browser is about this shouldn't be a problem for you.

I ran Firefox alongside IceCat and firefox is much faster in accessing websites even when using exact same extensions and search engine.
I would recommend developers to make the application snappy.

I like the idea of a totally free browser for ethical reason but the rest doesn't follow. Right now, the package ships with firefox 78.11.0esr while the latest firefox version is 92.0, outdated for more than a year.
It's really not a good idea for security reasons to have an outdated firefox and it gives no benefit over a hardened firefox ('user.js' easy way) or librewolf.
I would not recommend it to anyone.
Nothing works with Fedora34. Won't connect. Facebook - won't connect. Youtube - won't connect.
summary: Nothing works with Fedora34. Won't connect

description:
The browser is excellent but there too many constraints to handle. Just to handle my web banking I had to white-list 10 pages and still some coming due to draconian bank securities!
Almost every web page has some issues and had to white-list.
The Tor browser is a lot easier to manipulate than GNU IceCat.
summary: Nice Intention, but too many constraints

description: Muy práctico y útil.
Me agrada mucho mas que nada por la privacidad

Impossible de se connecter à gmail pour une première et je n'ai pas la patience de chercher à contourner cette impasse, j'ai autre chose à faire...
Je désinstalle car je pressent d'autres problèmes à venir. Quand vous ferez une appli qui marche, faites nous le savoir!
Отличный браузер, обеспечивающий защиту от утечек информации. Конечно, кому то может показаться, что он излишне строго подходит к делу, но коли подумать, а что важнее?
тупое нетестированное днище
